message: Thank you to our fans for your amazing support. #HuaweiSG

Attention! The future of phone screen unlocking has arrived. 

Equipped with new-age technology, the Huawei GR5’s finger print sensor 2.0 boasts an ultra-fast 0.5 second screen unlock feature. The GR5 can also detect your finger print even when your hands are wet!  

From 17 September to 31 October 2016, receive a FREE 32GB MicroSD Card when you purchase your Huawei GR5. #huaweisg

Terms and Conditions apply.

Get Instagram-worthy photos with every shot when you use the Huawei P9 camera! Equipped with DSLR-like functions, each P9 has a Leica camera, dual lens, and accompanying functions like the aperture mode to elevate your photography.

Find out how to fully utilise your P9 in our #HuaweiP9SG discussion: po.st/HuaweiP9HWZ

Fun times are all we usually find in photos with our buddies, but they're the ones who stick with us through rough times too.

Share your fondest memories of your friends with us, and you could stand the chance to win a Huawei P9! Find out how: po.st/P9ShootOffTheme4

Do you worry about your phone screen getting scratched by your keys whenever you place it in your pocket? 

An easy solution is to double insure your phone with a top notch screen protector! On top of that, a tempered glass screen protector will ensure sharpness and clarity, and increases outdoor visibility. Plus, you won't have to worry about pesky fingerprints getting in your way every now and then!

All you need is a great camera and a tasty mooncake to set off those Mid-Autumn Festival cravings. With clear, fast, and precise imagery, the #HuaweiP9 camera ensures strong image focus in any setting. 

#OO #HuaweiSG

Our last #OO Shoot-off theme: 'Troop'! Go on and assemble your squad to win a Huawei P9.

How to participate:
Step 1: Take a creative photo of your troop. Night-out wefies, matching #OOtds, or road trip memories are some good examples!
Step 2: Upload your shot on Instagram OR in the comments section of this Facebook post. Remember to make your postings public.
Step 3: Tag @HuaweiMobileSg on Instagram OR Huawei Mobile Singapore Facebook, and include #OO and #HuaweiP9SG in your caption.

The most creative and original #OO troop picture will walk away with a brand new Huawei P9! Contest #4 ends at 11.59 pm, 24 September (Saturday).

*All entries should be shot on smartphone cameras only. Images shot on DSLR cameras or with other professional equipment are not eligible for submission.
By participating in this contest, you  are deemed to have reviewed, read and accepted the Terms and Conditions: http://po.st/P9ShootOffTCs

Transfer files at the speed of an F1 car. Huawei Beam is the best way to share items between your Huawei phone and another NFC-capable device.

Because you deserve only the very best. 
Verify the authenticity of Huawei device before purchasing it with these easy steps. 

Proceed to http://po.st/HuaweiWarranty  
1) Enter your IMEI number and then click on submit
2) Upon submission, system will indicate your product model, warranty period* and is able identify the mobile device a local or a non local set.
 
*warranty period on system is based on manufacturing date.

If you're always on-the-go, the Huawei Matebook is styled with you in mind. Weighing at just 640 gramms, it's amazingly powerful with a 6th Gen Intel® Core™ m5 dual-core processor that clocks in at a blazing fast 3.1 GHz and features up to to 8GB LPDDR3 & up to 512GB high-speed SSD. 

What are you waiting for? 

Launch promotion: Matebook (S$1788)
Premium: Keyboard (worth S$148), Matedock (worth S$128), MatePen (Worth S$98), Mifi E5330 (Worth S$79), total worth S$453
Period: 13th - 31st Aug, while stocks last.

Retailer list here: http://po.st/MatebookRetailer

Never miss a moment out of focus with the #HuaweiP9 and P9 Plus. 
With our advanced Contrast detection auto focus (CDAF), Phase Detection Auto Focus (PDAF) and Laser Detection Auto Focus(LDAF), you'll be able to capture even the fastest of movements with precision. 

More tips and tricks found at our P9 discussion @ http://po.st/HuaweiP9HWZ

Change the way you see the world to win a Huawei P9.

We're giving away 4 sets of P9 from 15 August 2016 to 24 September 2016, with our #OO Shoot-Off! Here's how you can win:

1. Stay tuned to the Huawei Mobile Singapore Facebook page and and the @HuaweiMobileSg Instagram account. We'll be announcing the first theme on 15 August 2016.
2. Submit your best photo* according to the theme.
3. Find out if you're the lucky winner for the first theme on 1 September 2016!

Good luck and have fun shooting, Huawei fans!
 
*Only smartphone photos are accepted as submissions. For photos taken with Huawei P9 or P9 Plus (with Leica watermark) there's a higher chance of winning.

By participating in this contest, you  are deemed to have reviewed, read and accepted the Terms and Conditions: http://po.st/P9ShootOffTCs

You won't believe how easy it is to improve your user experience.
Turn on your GPS settings for when you use maps and weather applications to improve your location accuracy.  
 
Go to Setting -> Advanced Settings -> Location Services -> Enable Access to my Location & Use GPS Wi-Fi and mobile networks.
 
You can also select different modes for navigating:
 
1. Use GPS, Wi-Fi and Mobile Data: The Internet and GPS will synchronize and navigate accurately. 
2. Use GPS and Mobile Data: Navigation is operating through mobile data only. However, it helps to reduce power consumption and extend SOT*.
3. Use GPS only: Navigation is operating through GPS only. No mobile data will be consumed.
 
To learn more, contact us directly at our hotline 800-852-6666 or use our live chat services at http://consumer.huawei.com/sg/support/index.htm

* SOT or Screen on Time is the number of hours the screen was on. One can get this information from settings -> battery / power.

Enrica Brescia invites us on a Roman holiday with her #HuaweiP9 EyeEm Leica Camera #OO

Leica Camera's most notable look is its tendency to capture high contrasting details with a hint of a soft glow in its images. You too can create this distinguishable effect with the #HuaweiP9's Film Mode. 

Play around with any of the three modes (Standard, Vivid Colour and Smooth Colour) and watch your images come to life.
